subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Wild traded a sixth-round draft pick for Chris Simon, the troubled left wing. He left the arena before the Islanders lost to Pittsburgh despite outshooting the Penguins, 52-20.
snippet: The Wild traded a sixth-round draft pick for Chris Simon, the troubled left wing. He left the arena before the Islanders lost to Pittsburgh despite outshooting the Penguins, 52-20.
